titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: REFERRAL RAISED REASON (INTER-PROVIDER TRANSFER) - Description

div.p: REFERRAL RAISED REASON (INTER-PROVIDER TRANSFER) is the same as SERVICE REQUEST RAISED REASON, but has a restricted national code list.
REFERRAL RAISED REASON (INTER-PROVIDER TRANSFER) is the reason for referral of the PATIENT as part of an inter-provider transfer.
